Right Side Of The Room - RSOTR

RSOTR - The EP
The RSOTR EP is a 6 track, debut from Right Side Of The Room. Featuring genres from Lo-Fi to Deep House, many of the 5 producers skills are on show. After 3 months of production and a month of teasers, you can finally listen to the EP on YouTube and SoundCloud. Take a listen to the right of this text, or use the links above the title to see individual pages. - Right Side Of The Room
